newsitem.title: ESTONIA: TALLINNA, SAULES BANK LAUNCH PAYMENT PROJECT.
newsitem.headline: TALLINNA, SAULES BANK LAUNCH PAYMENT PROJECT.

text.p: Tallinna Pank and Saules Banka have signed an agreement under which payments between the Estonian and Latvian banks can be made within the same banking day, Tallinna Pank said on Tuesday.
The agreement says a payment made in freely convertible currencies quoted by Tallinna Pank will reach the receiver's account on the same banking day if it is made before two o'clock in the afternoon.
Payments to other than Saules Banka clients will still receive their money in two banking days, Tallinna Pank said in a statement.
The payment project is the first area where Saules and Tallinna have seen concrete results after Tallinna bought a 20 percent stake in Saules.
